languages.text: "Груз, пожалуй, не совсем верное слово — это шумная толпа людей в шрамах, требующих увидеть своего вожака. Они называют себя Ревущими, и считают вас своим лидером, посвятившим их в Имперское кредо и вытащившим их из Комморры. По их рассказам, некий ксенос в маске, говорящий загадками, каким-то образом провел их на корабль".

"I suppose 'cargo' is not quite the correct term. It is a disorderly crowd of heavily scarred people demanding to see you. They call themselves 'Shriekers' and consider you their leader who initiated them into the Imperial Creed and saved them from Commorragh. If their account is to be believed, some masked xenos who spoke in riddles somehow managed to transport them on board."
languages.original_text: "Груз, пожалуй, не совсем верное слово — это шумная толпа людей в шрамах, требующих увидеть своего вожака. Они называют себя Ревущими, и считают вас своим лидером, посвятившим их в Имперское кредо и вытащившим их из Комморры. По их рассказам, некий ксенос в маске, говорящий загадками, каким-то образом провел их на корабль".

traits.locale_text: "I suppose ‘item' is not quite a correct term. This is a noisy crowd of people covered in scars demanding to see their leader. They call themselves Howlers and consider you their leader who introduced them to the Imperial Creed and saved from Commorragh. According to their words, some masked xenos speaking in riddles led them into the ship somehow."

"I suppose ‘item' is not quite a correct term. This is a noisy crowd of people covered in scars demanding to see their leader. They call themselves Howlers and consider you their leader who introduced them to the Imperial Creed and saved from Commorragh. According to their words, some masked xenos speaking in riddles led them into the ship somehow."

"I suppose ‘cargo' is not quite the correct term. It is a noisy crowd of scarred humans demanding to see their leader. They call themselves 'Shriekers' and consider you their leader who initiated them into the Imperial Creed and saved them from Commorragh. According to them, some masked xenos speaking in riddles led them into the ship somehow."

"I suppose ‘cargo' is not quite the correct term. It is a noisy crowd of scarred humans demanding to see their leader. They call themselves 'Shriekers' and consider you their leader who initiated them into the Imperial Creed and saved them from Commorragh. According to them, some masked xenos speaking in riddles led them into the ship somehow."

"I suppose 'cargo' is not quite the correct term. It is a disorderly crowd of heavily scarred people demanding to see you. They call themselves 'Shriekers' and consider you their leader who initiated them into the Imperial Creed and saved them from Commorragh. If their account is to be believed, some masked xenos who spoke in riddles somehow managed to transport them on board."

languages.text: “我猜‘货物’这个词恐怕不太准确。那是一群浑身是伤的人类，他们坚持要见您一面。他们自称为‘尖啸者’，坚持说您就是他们的领袖，还说是您将他们从科摩罗解救出来，让他们皈依了帝国的信仰。根据他们的说法，有个戴着面具的异形说着古怪的谜语，不知怎么就把他们带到了船上。”
languages.original_text: "I suppose 'cargo' is not quite the correct term. It is a disorderly crowd of heavily scarred people demanding to see you. They call themselves 'Shriekers' and consider you their leader who initiated them into the Imperial Creed and saved them from Commorragh. If their account is to be believed, some masked xenos who spoke in riddles somehow managed to transport them on board."

traits.locale_text: “我猜‘货物’这个词恐怕不太准确。那是一群浑身是伤的人类，他们坚持要见您一面。他们自称为‘尖啸者’，坚持说您就是他们的领袖，还说是您将他们从科摩罗解救出来，让他们皈依了帝国的信仰。根据他们的说法，有个戴着面具的异形说着古怪的谜语，不知怎么就把他们带到了船上。”

languages.text: « "Cargaison" n'est peut-être pas le terme approprié ici. C'est une foule turbulente d'individus couturés de cicatrices qui demandent à vous voir. Ils se font appeler les "Hurleurs" et vous considèrent comme leur leader depuis que vous les avez initiés au Credo Impérial et sauvés de Commorragh. À les en croire, un xénos masqué au parler énigmatique aurait réussi à les conduire jusqu'à notre bord. »
languages.original_text: "I suppose 'cargo' is not quite the correct term. It is a disorderly crowd of heavily scarred people demanding to see you. They call themselves 'Shriekers' and consider you their leader who initiated them into the Imperial Creed and saved them from Commorragh. If their account is to be believed, some masked xenos who spoke in riddles somehow managed to transport them on board."

traits.locale_text: « "Cargaison" n'est peut-être pas le terme approprié ici. C'est une foule turbulente d'individus couturés de cicatrices qui demandent à vous voir. Ils se font appeler les "Hurleurs" et vous considèrent comme leur leader depuis que vous les avez initiés au Credo Impérial et sauvés de Commorragh. À les en croire, un xénos masqué au parler énigmatique aurait réussi à les conduire jusqu'à notre bord. »

languages.text: "Ich schätze, 'Fracht' trifft es nicht ganz. Es handelt sich um eine laute Menge von Personen mit schlimmen Narben, die Euch zu sehen verlangen. Sie bezeichnen sich selbst als 'Kreischer' und denken, Ihr hättet sie in den Imperialen Glauben eingeweiht und sie aus Commorragh gerettet. Wenn man ihren Berichten Glauben schenken darf, ist es maskierten Xenos, die in Rätseln gesprochen haben, irgendwie gelungen, sie an Bord zu transportieren."
languages.original_text: "I suppose 'cargo' is not quite the correct term. It is a disorderly crowd of heavily scarred people demanding to see you. They call themselves 'Shriekers' and consider you their leader who initiated them into the Imperial Creed and saved them from Commorragh. If their account is to be believed, some masked xenos who spoke in riddles somehow managed to transport them on board."

traits.locale_text: "Ich schätze, 'Fracht' trifft es nicht ganz. Es handelt sich um eine laute Menge von Personen mit schlimmen Narben, die Euch zu sehen verlangen. Sie bezeichnen sich selbst als 'Kreischer' und denken, Ihr hättet sie in den Imperialen Glauben eingeweiht und sie aus Commorragh gerettet. Wenn man ihren Berichten Glauben schenken darf, ist es maskierten Xenos, die in Rätseln gesprochen haben, irgendwie gelungen, sie an Bord zu transportieren."

languages.text: «Supongo que "cargamento" no es la palabra correcta. Es un agitado grupo de gente con cicatrices espantosas que exigen verle. Se hacen llamar "Aulladores" y {mf|lo|la} consideran su líder por iniciarles en el Credo Imperial y salvarlos de Commorragh. Según dicen, un xenos enmascarado que hablaba con acertijos logró transportarlos a la nave de algún modo».
languages.original_text: "I suppose 'cargo' is not quite the correct term. It is a disorderly crowd of heavily scarred people demanding to see you. They call themselves 'Shriekers' and consider you their leader who initiated them into the Imperial Creed and saved them from Commorragh. If their account is to be believed, some masked xenos who spoke in riddles somehow managed to transport them on board."

traits.locale_text: «Supongo que "cargamento" no es la palabra correcta. Es un agitado grupo de gente con cicatrices espantosas que exigen verle. Se hacen llamar "Aulladores" y {mf|lo|la} consideran su líder por iniciarles en el Credo Imperial y salvarlos de Commorragh. Según dicen, un xenos enmascarado que hablaba con acertijos logró transportarlos a la nave de algún modo».

languages.text: 「『貨物』という表現は適切ではないだろう。彼らは、あなたに会わせろと要求する無秩序で傷だらけの人々だ。自らを『シュリーカー』と呼び、帝国信条集に導き、コモラフから救ってくれたあなたを指導者とみなしている。彼らの話が本当であれば、謎めいた言葉を話す仮面の異種族たちが、どういうわけか彼らを船に送り込んだのだという」
languages.original_text: "I suppose 'cargo' is not quite the correct term. It is a disorderly crowd of heavily scarred people demanding to see you. They call themselves 'Shriekers' and consider you their leader who initiated them into the Imperial Creed and saved them from Commorragh. If their account is to be believed, some masked xenos who spoke in riddles somehow managed to transport them on board."

traits.locale_text: 「『貨物』という表現は適切ではないだろう。彼らは、あなたに会わせろと要求する無秩序で傷だらけの人々だ。自らを『シュリーカー』と呼び、帝国信条集に導き、コモラフから救ってくれたあなたを指導者とみなしている。彼らの話が本当であれば、謎めいた言葉を話す仮面の異種族たちが、どういうわけか彼らを船に送り込んだのだという」

languages.text: "Buna 'gönderi' de denemez aslında. Gelenler, ağır yaralı bir grup insan. Sizinle görüşmeyi talep ettiler. Kendilerine 'Çığırtkan' diyorlar. Kendilerini İmparatorluk İtikadı'na alıp Commorragh'tan kurtaran komutanın siz olduğunuzu söylüyorlar. Dediklerinin aslı varsa... Bilmece gibi konuşan maskeli zenolar, onları bir şekilde gemiye getirmiş."
languages.original_text: "I suppose 'cargo' is not quite the correct term. It is a disorderly crowd of heavily scarred people demanding to see you. They call themselves 'Shriekers' and consider you their leader who initiated them into the Imperial Creed and saved them from Commorragh. If their account is to be believed, some masked xenos who spoke in riddles somehow managed to transport them on board."
